Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller.playersState

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    AfterMainActionState
    State after the player has chosen the Main Action (takeResourcesFromMarket || buyDevCard || activateProduction)
    BeforeMainActionState
    State before the player has chosen the Main Action (takeResourcesFromMarket || buyDevCard || activateProduction)
    BuyDevCardState
    State used to manage the purchase of a developmentCard
    MarketState
    State used to manage the storage of resources taken from the MarbleMarket
    PlayerState
    Genetic state of the player
    ProductionState
    State used to manage the payment of the resources needed to complete the production of the development cards selected in the previous state (BeforeMainActionState) and to add the produced resources to the player's strongbox
